name: 嵌入式系統
goals: Understand the basic concepts of Embedded Systems
Familiar with structures of system hardware and is able to expand mem
Develop skills in problem-solving through assignments/ projects.
Apply theoretical knowledge to practical problems through assignments/ projects.
Familiar with various interface circuit principles and technologies
Effectively and creatively delivers the information to the audience
syllabus:
(16+2 Weeks)

1.   嵌入式系統簡介Introduction to Embedded Systems

2.   嵌入式c语言Simplest Embedded C Program: Variables, Types,

     Arrays,Strings, Pointers, etc.

3.   微處理器與微控制器Microprocessors/Microcontrollers

4.   ARM 架構概述、內存、狀態暫存器ARM Architecture Overview,Memory, Status   

     Register

5.   硬體週邊Hardware Peripherals: Timers, PWM, A/D, Serial, IO ports, and interrupts

     ARM Assembly Programming

6.   即時操作系統Real-time operating system (RTOS)

7.   嵌入式系統中的軟硬體協同設計

     Hardware-software codesign in an embedded system

8.   報告Presentation & report

\* 表可能會有所變動。

\* The schedule is subject to change.

methodologies.note: 嵌入式系統概念講座Lectures on concepts of Embedded Systems
案例研究及專題報告Cases studies and project reports

grading.note: 實踐能力培養practical ability cultivation
測試基礎概念Test understanding of fundamental concepts

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
